Name: $1 Ride
About the game: $1 Ride is a casual game with a fast paced, timing and reflex testing game-play style. Travel through space at warp speed! Collect power ups to increase your speed or risk your fuel to collect money, missiles and more. $1 Ride Features - Collect power ups and loot as you fly through space. - Do battle with your friends on the leaderboards. - Unlock new ships. - A fantastic soundtrack by Eric Matyas.

Meta Description: Looking for information on $1 Ride? Check out the release date (Jul 28, 2016), developer insights from BeHappy Studios, and a complete game summary.
